channel.title: !////""""first for me Tredgen glad to get it out""""\\\\!
channel.description:
Tredgen Is now Ready for every one to download.
EDIT: New-Rune Webclient does not have music any more! Scroll down below to learn how to take the music out server side so the server does not crash!
Must use New-Rune webclient for this source!!!!
[URL=http://"http://www.new-rune.co.nr"][IMG]http://www.freewebs.com/legendaryvideogames/newrune.PNG[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/6100/screen6id7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/6936/screen2jy7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/5530/screen3bx0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/7967/screen4jp1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/2364/screen5qt9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/554/screen7tp3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/369/screen8co3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/6652/screen9tt5.png[/img]
What it has:
=======7 QUESTS========= -Bananas -Dragon Slayer -Monkey Madness -Murder Mystery -Desert Treasure -Wizard of Mort'ton -Rune Mysteries =======================
-MUSIC -SOUND EFFECTS -Level 1, 2, and 3 Treasure trails, 27 total clues. -Nearly full combat(Melee, range, magic) -ONLY SERVER SOURCE THAT HAS [COLOR="Lime"]WORKING GRAND EXCHANGE[/COLOR] (my pride and joy lol) -90% [COLOR="lime"]REAL Barrows[/COLOR] mini game. -2 Random events -Ghostly Robes recieved from different Ghosts(after finishing Desert Treasure quest) -Working Dwarf Multi Cannon(Coolest version, cannon parts recieved from random event) -Nearly all skills trainable.(aglity,farming and thieving weren't added cause I got lazy.) -90% Special Attacks -Working Prayers(not all finished) -Working Potions. -All Monkey Gree Grees work 90% -Auto Skill cape trimming(2 99s or more) -Good Guthan and Dharok Armour Specials -Admins Arent Aloud to Trade(so they don't give out free stuff) -Working Make X (cooking, fletching, smithing) -Sorta Working Tztok-Jad(got messed up when I transfered the good version from my other server) -Trade Scamming Fixed -Fixed Magic on Npcs that have no combat level -Godsword Challenges(My way of getting the godswords) -Rare Item Drops -Rare Items recieved from Genie Random Event(which doesn't happen that often) -Most npcs drop 1-10k Coins so thats how you make money. -All npcs in the server so far have animations, except zombies and goblins...ugh. -Fixed 2handed weapons, you can't wield a shield item after you wield a 2h weapon(except bows lol)
====These next ones weren't really created by me..just added======
-Npc Facing -Npc Following (npc clipping didn't work, so I took it out) -Player Following
=========Things I was going to add but never did===============
-Red Vs Blue mini game -Duel Arena -More Npcs to fight -The last 3 skills -The rest of the Prayer Spells -Rest of Magic Spells -More Grand Exchange Spots and another Selling Spot. -Working Player and Npc Defence. -Npcs don't stand on you when in combat.
File Size: 824 KB File Type: RAR
[URL=http://"http://www.freewebs.com/legendaryvideogames/Tredgen%20Server%20Source.rar"]Download[/URL]
Please leave positive comments.
:p
How to Make this source work with silabs Client (easy as heck)
replace this void
[CODE]public void frame174(int i1, int i2, int i3) // another thing, tested doesn't logout, looks like something to do with music { outStream.createFrame(174); outStream.writeWord(i1); outStream.writeByte(i2); outStream.writeWord(i3); //sendMessage("Frame 174 tested"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/CODE]
with this
[CODE]public void frame174(int i1, int i2, int i3) // another thing, tested doesn't logout, looks like something to do with music { /*outStream.createFrame(174); outStream.writeWord(i1); outStream.writeByte(i2); outStream.writeWord(i3); //sendMessage("Frame 174 tested"); */ updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/CODE]
then search for this
[CODE]outStream.createFrame(74); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(song);//Canifis music[/CODE]
and delete those 2 lines.
Now search for
[CODE]sendMessage(":START:");[/CODE]
and
[CODE]sendMessage(":STOP:");[/CODE]
Delete all of those sendMessages (forgot how many there are...should be like 2 of each, idk)
:) detected :)

item.title: !////""""first for me Tredgen glad to get it out""""\\\\!
item.dc:creator: @detected detected
item.description:
@detected wrote:

Tredgen Is now Ready for every one to download.

EDIT: New-Rune Webclient does not have music any more! Scroll down below to learn how to take the music out server side so the server does not crash!

Must use New-Rune webclient for this source!!!

What it has:

=======7 QUESTS=========
-Bananas
-Dragon Slayer
-Monkey Madness
-Murder Mystery
-Desert Treasure
-Wizard of Mort’ton
-Rune Mysteries

-MUSIC
-SOUND EFFECTS
-Level 1, 2, and 3 Treasure trails, 27 total clues.
-Nearly full combat(Melee, range, magic)
-ONLY SERVER SOURCE THAT HAS [COLOR=“Lime”]WORKING GRAND EXCHANGE[/COLOR] (my pride and joy lol)
-90% [COLOR=“lime”]REAL Barrows[/COLOR] mini game.
-2 Random events
-Ghostly Robes recieved from different Ghosts(after finishing Desert Treasure quest)
-Working Dwarf Multi Cannon(Coolest version, cannon parts recieved from random event)
-Nearly all skills trainable.(aglity,farming and thieving weren’t added cause I got lazy.)
-90% Special Attacks
-Working Prayers(not all finished)
-Working Potions.
-All Monkey Gree Grees work 90%
-Auto Skill cape trimming(2 99s or more)
-Good Guthan and Dharok Armour Specials
-Admins Arent Aloud to Trade(so they don’t give out free stuff)
-Working Make X (cooking, fletching, smithing)
-Sorta Working Tztok-Jad(got messed up when I transfered the good version from my other server)
-Trade Scamming Fixed
-Fixed Magic on Npcs that have no combat level
-Godsword Challenges(My way of getting the godswords)
-Rare Item Drops
-Rare Items recieved from Genie Random Event(which doesn’t happen that often)
-Most npcs drop 1-10k Coins so thats how you make money.
-All npcs in the server so far have animations, except zombies and goblins…ugh.
-Fixed 2handed weapons, you can’t wield a shield item after you wield a 2h weapon(except bows lol)

====These next ones weren’t really created by me…just added======

-Npc Facing
-Npc Following
(npc clipping didn’t work, so I took it out)
-Player Following

=========Things I was going to add but never did===============

-Red Vs Blue mini game
-Duel Arena
-More Npcs to fight
-The last 3 skills
-The rest of the Prayer Spells
-Rest of Magic Spells
-More Grand Exchange Spots and another Selling Spot.
-Working Player and Npc Defence.
-Npcs don’t stand on you when in combat.

File Size: 824 KB
File Type: RAR

Download

Please leave positive comments.

How to Make this source work with silabs Client (easy as heck)

replace this void

public void frame174(int i1, int i2, int i3) // another thing, tested doesn't logout, looks like something to do with music { outStream.createFrame(174); outStream.writeWord(i1); outStream.writeByte(i2); outStream.writeWord(i3); //sendMessage("Frame 174 tested"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

with this

public void frame174(int i1, int i2, int i3) // another thing, tested doesn't logout, looks like something to do with music { /*outStream.createFrame(174); outStream.writeWord(i1); outStream.writeByte(i2); outStream.writeWord(i3); //sendMessage("Frame 174 tested"); */ updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

then search for this

outStream.createFrame(74); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(song);//Canifis music

and delete those 2 lines.

Now search for

sendMessage(":START:");

and

sendMessage(":STOP:");

Delete all of those sendMessages (forgot how many there are…should be like 2 of each, idk)

detected

Read full topic
